documentation.author: Chirayu Patel
documentation.purpose: Alert for providers when anticoagulants are discontinued and no other orders for VTE/DVT prophylaxis are in ordered status.
documentation.explanation: The rule fires off on the discontinuation of anticoagulants. The rule then looks for existing orders for Comfort Care Only, Comfort Measures, antiocoagulants, or compression device intermittent pneumatic.
documentation.keywords: VTE, DVT Anticoagulant INR Comfort measures Surgical

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with action of ORDER_ACTION and order detail OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_ACTION_INC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with action of ORDER_ACTION and order detail OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_COUNT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the number of orders selected in LINK is QUALIFIER NUM
templateDefinitions.description: Evaluates number of orders or clinical events found in preceding template

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_HTML_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert with title OPT_TITLE from html file HTML_FILE with parameters OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_OVERRIDE_DEFAULT, OPT_PROBLEMS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_PROBLEM, OPT_PROB_CONFIRMATION, OPT_PROB_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_FREETEXT_PARAM, OPT_OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_LINK.

value.value: SELECT Total = count(distinct o.order_id) FROM orders o, order_detail od, order_detail od1, order_detail od2 where o.encntr_id = trigger_encntrid and o.catalog_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"HEPARIN")) and o.catalog_type_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",6000,"PHARMACY")) and o.order_status_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",6004,"ORDERED")) and o.template_order_flag in (0, 1) and od.order_id = o.order_id and od.oe_field_meaning in ("STRENGTHDOSE") and od.oe_field_display_value = "5,000"@NEWLINEand od1.order_id = o.order_id and od1.oe_field_meaning in ("STRENGTHDOSEUNIT") and od1.oe_field_display_value = "unit(s)" and od2.order_id = o.order_id and od2.oe_field_meaning in ("FREQ") and od2.oe_field_display_value in ("q8hr","q8hr (interval)") detail log_misc1 = cnvtstring(Total), log_message = build("Total Heparin =",Total) with nocounter go

SELECT Total = count(distinct o.order_id) FROM orders o, order_detail od, order_detail od1, order_detail od2 where o.encntr_id = trigger_encntrid and o.catalog_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ASPIRIN")) and o.catalog_type_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",6000,"PHARMACY")) and o.order_status_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",6004,"ORDERED")) and o.template_order_flag in (0, 1) and od.order_id = o.order_id and od.oe_field_meaning in ("STRENGTHDOSE") and od.oe_field_display_value = "325"@NEWLINEand od1.order_id = o.order_id and od1.oe_field_meaning in ("STRENGTHDOSEUNIT") and od1.oe_field_display_value = "mg"@NEWLINEand od2.order_id = o.order_id and od2.oe_field_meaning in ("FREQ") and od2.oe_field_display_value in ("2xDaily","2xDaily ac","2xDaily and hs","2xDaily with meals") detail log_misc1 = cnvtstring(Total), log_message = build("Total Aspirin =",Total)@NEWLINEwith nocounter go

values.value: Low Risk for VTE-Ambulating Appropriately-Padua Score <4 or Caprini Score < 3
Mechanical and chemical prophylaxis are contraindicated at this time
